description: This source file implements a middleware component for API key authentication in a FastAPI application. It includes functions to verify API keys from request headers and defines middleware to handle authentication logic, excluding certain routes.

methods.name: bool _authorized(api_keys: Iterable[str], request: Request)
methods.description: Checks if the request contains a valid API key or Bearer token against the list of authorized API keys.

methods.name: api_key_auth_middleware(request: Request, call_next)
methods.description: FastAPI middleware function that enforces API key authentication for protected routes, skipping '/' and '/health'.
